name: Nightly UI Tweaks
description: Some tweaks for the UI in recent nightlys, mostly for the tab- and tool bars. Tested with 14a1 and later.
additional_info:
Style works best with the following settings:

* Windows Aero Theme
* Tabs on top (doesn't make much sense to use this if you prefer the tabs below the tool bar - it will look broken)
* should work with personas
* Menu bar OFF

Features:

* active tab sticks out - inactive tabs are almost fully transparent
* tab bar wastes less space (especially in Aero mode)
* personal bookmarks bar is more compact (height reduced)
* main tool bar and personal tool bar are now grey instead of baby-blue :)
* APP button always shows Firefox Icon, no matter what build you are using

Issues (known)

* Menu bar overlaps slightly with tabs when using non-Aero theme in Windows
* completely untested on OS X and Linux (will most likely NOT work - suggestions and improvements welcome though)

version history: 

0.1 - initial release (2012-04-24)
0.2 - fixed: improved compatibility with personas, fixed minor glitches when HWA (direct2d) is active.
